subject: Re: [junit] Exception Error
msgSnippet: Hi, Problems running JUnit, Got to http://www.junit.org. Download junit3.8.1.zip. Extract it to a directory.( for me it is d: ) Open a command prompt. got to
messageBody:
Hi,
Problems running JUnit,
Got to http://www.junit.org

Download junit3.8.1.zip.
Extract it to a directory.( for me it is d:\)
Open a command prompt.
got to the home directory of JUnit.
for me it is d:\junit3.8.1.
Then set the classpath as,

set CLASSPATH=.;junit.jar;src.jar;%CLASSPATH%

Then run to see whether all is set by running.

java java junit.tests.AllTests

Now you should see something like this:

.........................................
.........................................
.........
Time: 2.173

OK (91 tests)
You are all set for executing JUnit.
Don't forget to make the junit.jar and src.jar in your
system classpath.

Regards,
Guddu
http://techtips.ontheweb.com




--- Jayaprakash <jprakash76@...> wrote:
> hi anupama,
>
> set the Junit path to PATH variable, if needed i
> will give the path setting and class path settings
> ...
>
> With regards
> Jay
>
> anupama <anupama@...> wrote:
> hi,
>
> Sorry i couldn't understand the procedure which u
> have asked me to do.I have placed all my files in
> the same directory of junit3.8.1.In junit3.8.1,junit
> (samples folder),junit.jar and src.jar files are
> placed.
>
> Actually i have set the path as<
>
C:\j2sdk1.4.0_02\lib;C:\junit3.8.1\junit3.8.1\junit.jar;\C:\Documents
> and
>
Settings\Anupama\Desktop\Junit3.8.1\junit3.8.1\junit\samples>
>
> After compiling i am running AllTests.java file in
> command prompt as c:\java junit.textui.TestRunner
> junit.samples.AllTests.After running it is
> displaying an error as"Exception in thread "main"
>
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:junit/Textui/TestRunner
>
> Please give me the solution.
>
> Anupama
>
>
>
